import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DailyGoalsForWeek=_ref=>{let{weekGoals,updateDailyGoal,toggleDailyGoalCompletion}=_ref;// Array of days of the week
const daysOfWeek=['Monday','Tuesday','Wednesday','Thursday','Friday','Saturday','Sunday'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"text-lg font-semibold mb-2",children:"Daily Goals for Selected Week"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap justify-between",children:daysOfWeek.map((day,dayIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full sm:w-1/2 md:w-1/3 lg:w-1/4 xl:w-1/7 p-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border rounded p-2 h-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"font-medium mb-2",children:day}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-2",children:[0,1].map(goalIndex=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:weekGoals[dayIndex]&&weekGoals[dayIndex][goalIndex]&&weekGoals[dayIndex][goalIndex].text||'',onChange:e=>updateDailyGoal(dayIndex,goalIndex,e.target.value),className:"flex-grow p-2 border rounded mr-2",placeholder:`Goal ${goalIndex+1}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>toggleDailyGoalCompletion(dayIndex,goalIndex),className:`p-2 rounded ${weekGoals[dayIndex]&&weekGoals[dayIndex][goalIndex]&&weekGoals[dayIndex][goalIndex].completed?'bg-green-500 text-white':'bg-gray-200'}`,children:"\u2713"})]},goalIndex))})]})},day))})]});};export default DailyGoalsForWeek;
